TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapCodeExporter extends System.Xml.Serialization.CodeExporter

summary.span: 从 WSDL 文档中定义的 SOAP 编码的消息部分的内部类型映射信息生成类型和特性声明。

span.span: Generates types and attribute declarations from internal type mapping information for SOAP-encoded message parts defined in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由[Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)和时从 Web 服务描述语言 （生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类的类WSDL) 文档。The class is used by the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88) and the class while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 而不是使用直接使用 Wsdl.exe。Instead of using directly, use Wsdl.exe.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.span: ，它指定要生成的类型的命名空间。

summary.span: 假定没有代码编译单元，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, assuming no code compile unit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是直接创建的实例类，而使用 Wsdl.exe 工具。Instead of directly creating an instance of the class, use the Wsdl.exe tool.

summary.span: 向方法参数或对应于 WSDL 文档中 SOAP 消息定义的 part 元素的返回值添加 声明。

span.span: Add a declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a part element of a SOAP message definition in a WSDL document.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddMappingMetadata (System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection metadata, System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping member);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddMappingMetadata(class System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection metadata, class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping member) cil managed
Public Sub AddMappingMetadata (metadata As CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection, member As XmlMemberMapping)
public: void AddMappingMetadata(System::CodeDom::CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection ^ metadata, System::Xml::Serialization::XmlMemberMapping ^ member);

param.name: metadata
param.span: 生成类型的 对象的集合，方法向该集合添加特性声明。

span.span: The collection of objects for the generated type, to which the method adds an attribute declaration.

param.name: member
param.span: WSDL 消息定义中单个部分的内部 .NET Framework 类型映射。

span.span: An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single part of a WSDL message definition.

summary.span: 向方法参数或对应于 WSDL 文档中 SOAP 消息定义的 part 元素的返回值添加 声明。

span.span: Add a declaration to a method parameter or return value corresponding to a part element of a SOAP message definition in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 WSDL 文档指定 SOAP 编码，如 SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中所述，将由 Wsdl.exe 工具使用此方法。This method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddMappingMetadata (System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection metadata, System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping member, bool forceUseMemberName);

.method public hidebysig instance void AddMappingMetadata(class System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection metadata, class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMemberMapping member, bool forceUseMemberName) cil managed

param.name: metadata
param.span: 生成类型的 对象的集合，方法向该集合添加特性声明。

span.span: The collection of objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.

param.name: member
param.span: WSDL 消息定义中单个部分的内部 .NET Framework 类型映射。

span.span: An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single part of a WSDL message definition.

param.name: forceUseMemberName
param.span: 如果要添加的初始参数包含要生成的特性声明的 XML 元素名，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to add an initial argument that contains the XML element name for the attribute declaration that is being generated; otherwise, .

summary.span: 向方法参数或对应于 WSDL 文档中 SOAP 消息定义的 part 元素的返回值添加 声明。

span.span: Adds a declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a part element of a SOAP message definition in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 WSDL 文档指定 SOAP 编码，如 SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中所述，将由 Wsdl.exe 工具使用此方法。This method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ExportMembersMapping (System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping xmlMembersMapping);
.method public hidebysig instance void ExportMembersMapping(class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping xmlMembersMapping) cil managed
public: void ExportMembersMapping(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlMembersMapping ^ xmlMembersMapping);

param.name: xmlMembersMapping
param.span: WSDL 消息定义中元素部分的内部 .NET Framework 类型映射。

span.span: Internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

summary.span: 为属于 WSDL 文档中的 SOAP 消息定义的每个部分生成 .NET Framework 类型和特性声明。

span.span: Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for each of the parts that belong to a SOAP message definition in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 WSDL 文档指定 SOAP 编码，如 SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中所述，将由 Wsdl.exe 工具使用此方法。This method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ExportTypeMapping (System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping xmlTypeMapping);
.method public hidebysig instance void ExportTypeMapping(class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping xmlTypeMapping) cil managed
public: void ExportTypeMapping(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlTypeMapping ^ xmlTypeMapping);

param.name: xmlTypeMapping
param.span: SOAP 标头元素的内部 .NET Framework 类型映射信息。

span.span: Internal .NET Framework type mapping information for a SOAP header element.

summary.span: 为 SOAP 标头生成 .NET Framework 类型和特性声明。

span.span: Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for a SOAP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 Wsdl.exe 工具使用此方法。This method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool.
